鳨鳨鳨

鳨字的基本解释

鳨
lì
古书上说的一种似凫而比凫小的鸟。
鸩的别称。

鳨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《廣韻》林直切，入職，來。］
(1)日本和字。
(2)一种似凫而小的鸟。
(3)鸩的别名。

鳨字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鳨； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1481第09
【廣韻】林直切【集韻】六直切，?音力。【玉篇】鳥似鳧而小。【集韻】一曰鴆別名。【玉篇】同?。

鳨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鳨字的起名意思

暂无。

Carp
Basic explanation of words
Carp
lì
It is said in ancient books that a bird that resembles a mallard but is smaller than a mallard.
Another name for 鸩.
Carp
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lì］
["Guangyun" Lin Zhiqie, enter the post, come. ]
(1) Japanese and characters.
(2) A small bird that looks like a mallard.
(3) The alias of Xun.
Carp
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鳨; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1481 Page 09
[Guang Yun] Lin Zhiqie【Jiyun】Six straight cuts, sound power. [Jade articles] Birds are like mallards but small. [Ji Yun] Yi said the alias of "dun". [Jade articles] The same?.
